Annie Chu

Hello!

I'm Annie (she/her), a 2nd year PhD student at Northwestern University in the Technology & Social Behavior program, a dual PhD program in Computer Science and Communications.

I'm currently at the Interactive Audio Lab, advised by Dr. Bryan Pardo. My research interests lie at the intersection of audio, machine learning, multimodal systems, human-computer interaction, and accessible & inclusive interfaces.

Previously, I completed my B.S. in Electrical & Computer Engineering with a concentration in Media Arts at Olin College in Boston, MA. In my free time, you can find me walking around record shops, watching stand up, or playing bananagrams. I am also on the hunt for the best bagel in Chicago.

You can reach me at anniechu [at] u.northwestern.edu

01/2025 update! Text2FX has been accepted to ICASSP 2025! Check out the paper (arXiv) and the demo page.
